product_description: Ruffled trim accentuates the square neckline of a pretty floral minidress fashioned with gently puffed long sleeves.
product_details_and_care:
Ruffled trim accentuates the square neckline of a pretty floral minidress fashioned with gently puffed long sleeves.
34 1/2" length (size Medium)
Slips on over head
Square neck
Long sleeves with smocked cuffs
Smocked back
Unlined
100% rayon
Hand wash, line dry
